text: Exotic Blend is the first EP by the Quebec hard rock group GrimSkunk released in 1992. It features Uncle Costa from Blood Sausage on Perestroïska. == Track listing == #Loaded Gun #Perestroïska #Gormenghast #Bugs In Billy Bob's Bed #It's In My Head #Nursery Rhyme == References == * Bande à part profile Category:GrimSkunk albums Category:1992 debut EPs
title: Exotic Blend
